title: Raja Raja Kula Lyrics From NOTA Tamil Movie
stanzas:
raja raja kula
raja raja kula
raja raja (2)

o bodhai undhan
mele, raja
sorgam undhan
kezhe, raja

pengal undhan
pinne, raja
dhesam undhan
munne, raja.

aasai aasai
thuraththu raja
aadasolli ketkudhu
raja
aahaa inbam
izhukkuthu raja
aatchi unnai
azhaikkuthu raja

aadai munne
nazhuvuthu raja
aanaal nenjam
negizhuthu raja
aayiram aandugal
aadugavendru
aanai ondru
poduthu raja

raja raja kula
raja raja kula
raja raja kula
raja raja (2)

o...aathula methakka
kaathathu adikka
oduthu oduthu odam.
dam dam.
odam odattum

naanathai verukka
yethuka marukka
yeruthu yeruthu
kreedam dam dam
baaram kootattum

manasoru puram
sarasam oru puram
naduvinil kuzhambum
raja

kanai oru puram
idaigal oru puram
edhuvena muzhikkum
raja

solvadhu kezhaa
nenjudane vazhnthavan
indha raja
aasaigal ennum
ambudane veezhnthavan
indha raja

innum eththanai
peraasaigal
naan.. theda
vidaiye vidaiye
ambugal paayuthe.

azhaipaayum raja rajan ivan
adhi dheera raja rajan ivan
azhagaana raja rajan ivan
raja raja kula raja...

raja raja kula
raja raja kula
raja raja kula
raja raja (2)

seo.title: Raja Raja Kula Lyrics From NOTA Tamil Movie
seo.description: Get the complete Raja Raja Kula Lyrics From NOTA Tamil Movie from NOTA. Read the lyrics penned by Karky and composed by Sam CS and sung by Anirudh. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Karky, NOTA, Sam CS, Anirudh, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
